sentences.sContent: Cocaine is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cocaine is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant.
sentences.sCn: 可卡因是一种结晶状的莨菪生物碱，是从古柯叶中提取得来的。

sentences.sContent: The true alkaloid nicotine in nicotiana functions as an allomone against many insect species .
sentences.sContent_eng: The true alkaloid nicotine in nicotiana functions as an allomone against many insect species .
sentences.sCn: 烟草属中的真生物碱，烟碱作为利已激素，能防治许多昆虫。

trans.tranOther: any of a group of nitrogenous basic compounds found in plants, typically insoluble in water and physiologically active
